=====================================

# Contract Notice - PR11700_39903
=====================================

## Tender Announcement
------------------------

**Title:** Vials, Caps, and Septa

**Contract Notice:** WS4422716804 (Reference Number: Doc4445471129)
**Announcement Date:** February 15, 2024
**Closing Date for Tenders:** March 15, 2024, 14:00 EDT

**Amendment Details**
--------------------

**Amendment Date:** February 29, 2024
**Amendment Number:** 1

**Contract Overview**
---------------------

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is inviting tenders for the purchase of 10,000 vials, caps, and septas capable of retaining a microaerophilic gas mixture. The requirement is to maintain the viability and growth of Campylobacter fetus sp. after specimen collection and transportation to the laboratory. This procurement is part of the mandate for the Animal Health Microbiology Laboratory and relates to Import and Export regulations.

**Additional Periods**
----------------------

The bidder has the option to purchase additional units (up to 10,000) for two additional periods of one year each.

**Pre-Award Trial**
-------------------

The bidder must submit 80 pre-award samples, which will be subjected to a trial. These samples must be sent on or before the closing date and time of the tender. Failure to meet this requirement may result in the bidder's application being declared non-responsive.

**Location and Delivery**
-------------------------

The required equipment will be delivered to the Canadian Food Inspection Agency at the following location:

11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

----------------

---------------------------
